content.text: 이제 app/next에 이전에 만들어놓은 animation registry와 scroll event들이componet와 조화롭게 동작하는지를 알아보고 싶어, @ui/shadcn/compoents/section/Enterance.tsx와 BasicSection.tsx를 만들고 template/next에 scrollevent와 animation을 주입시켜서 temlate/next app 페이지에 들어가면 enterance.tsx에 있는 enterance compoent와 basicsecion 5개로 구성된 화면이 나오게 만들어줘 entreance는 간단하게  title, descrtion, button으로 구성되어 있고 baiscSection은 title,descrition으로 구성되어 있어. 즉 먼저 ui/shadcn패키지에 enterance, basicsecion 컴포넌트를 만들고 gsap이 있는곳 패키지에 showfromzeroalpha라는 animation객체를 만든 다음에 app에서 그걸 불러와서 최종적으로는5개의 sectoin과 enterance page가 보여야해,  basicsection compoent는props에 title,description말고 color를 가져올수 있는데 이건 배경색을 지정하는 변수가 될거야. 즉 app에 들어갈때는 총 5까지 다른색깔이 구분되어서 스크롤 이벤트 등이 제대로 동작하는지를 알 수 있어야해  각 section이 scroll을 내려서 보이면 각각 showfromzeroalpha가 동작해서 투명해진 글자들이 드러나 보이고 console에서는 내부적으로 secoen ${number} 가 보여야해

payload.text:
**Designing scroll-animated sections and components**

I'm figuring out how to create Enterance and BasicSection components with scroll-triggered animations using data-anim attributes like title and description. I want to use ScrollSections to wrap multiple sections, log when each comes into view, and apply a showFromZeroAlpha animation preset. Also, I’m considering how to handle background colors flexibly for BasicSection while keeping consistent layout and how to integrate all this smoothly with existing SectionWrapper and project TypeScript paths. There is a lot here! I'll focus on clean attribute usage, reliable animation triggering, and clear console logging for section entries.

summary.text:
**Designing scroll-animated sections and components**

I'm figuring out how to create Enterance and BasicSection components with scroll-triggered animations using data-anim attributes like title and description. I want to use ScrollSections to wrap multiple sections, log when each comes into view, and apply a showFromZeroAlpha animation preset. Also, I’m considering how to handle background colors flexibly for BasicSection while keeping consistent layout and how to integrate all this smoothly with existing SectionWrapper and project TypeScript paths. There is a lot here! I'll focus on clean attribute usage, reliable animation triggering, and clear console logging for section entries.

payload.text:
**Creating new animation preset and updating data-anim attributes**

I'm defining a new animation preset `showFromZeroAlpha` in the UI package, planning to animate elements like pane, title, description, and button with opacity and position changes. I realized that querying elements by `[data-anim="pane"]` inside the root section misses the root itself, so I need to update components like `Enterance` and `BasicSection` to add `data-anim="pane"` on an inner div to target animations properly. I'll patch those components accordingly to ensure the animation applies as intended.

summary.text:
**Creating new animation preset and updating data-anim attributes**

I'm defining a new animation preset `showFromZeroAlpha` in the UI package, planning to animate elements like pane, title, description, and button with opacity and position changes. I realized that querying elements by `[data-anim="pane"]` inside the root section misses the root itself, so I need to update components like `Enterance` and `BasicSection` to add `data-anim="pane"` on an inner div to target animations properly. I'll patch those components accordingly to ensure the animation applies as intended.

payload.name: apply_patch
payload.input:
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: packages/ui/shadcn/components/section/Enterance.tsx
@@
-    <section
-      data-anim="pane"
+    <section
+      data-anim="pane"
       data-scroll-anim="showFromZeroAlpha"
       className={cn(
         "flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-6 py-24 px-4 text-center sm:px-6 lg:px-8",
         "bg-background transition-colors dark:bg-neutral-950",
         className,
       )}
     >
-      <div className="mx-auto flex max-w-4xl flex-col items-center gap-6">
+      <div
+        data-anim="pane"
+        className="mx-auto flex max-w-4xl flex-col items-center gap-6"
+      >
*** End Patch

@@

       data-scroll-anim="showFromZeroAlpha"
       className={cn(
         "py-24 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 transition-colors",
         color,
         className,
       )}
     >
-      <div className="mx-auto flex max-w-4xl flex-col gap-4">
+      <div data-anim="pane" className="mx-auto flex max-w-4xl flex-col gap-4">
*** End Patch

payload.text:
**Reviewing component details and lint considerations**

I'm thinking about whether to run tests or linting, leaning towards optional lint for the `@template/next` filter to keep it light. Meanwhile, I want to double-check that component props like `BasicSection`'s `color` handle multiple classes well and that data attributes for animations are correctly applied in `Enterance` and `ScrollSections`. I also need to confirm import paths, default animations, and optional event handlers before gathering a `git diff` to see changes clearly.

payload.text:
**Preparing detailed final summary**

I'm gathering key points for a final message covering new component files, updates to BasicSection, animation additions, and changes to `page.tsx`. I'll include approximate line numbers and file paths, mention testing steps like running `pnpm --filter @template/next lint`, and note console log triggers, aiming for a clear, bullet-pointed summary with next-step suggestions.

summary.text:
**Preparing detailed final summary**

I'm gathering key points for a final message covering new component files, updates to BasicSection, animation additions, and changes to `page.tsx`. I'll include approximate line numbers and file paths, mention testing steps like running `pnpm --filter @template/next lint`, and note console log triggers, aiming for a clear, bullet-pointed summary with next-step suggestions.

payload.message:
- Wired up new landing pieces so you can validate scroll animations end-to-end: added `Enterance` and `BasicSection` components with GSAP-ready `data-anim` hooks and configurable backgrounds/button actions (`packages/ui/shadcn/components/section/Enterance.tsx:1`, `packages/ui/shadcn/components/section/BasicSection.tsx:1`).
- Registered the `showFromZeroAlpha` preset to fade and slide content in as sections enter the viewport (`packages/ui/gsap/src/presets/showFromZeroAlpha.ts:1`, `packages/ui/gsap/src/presets/index.ts:1`).
- Reworked the Next template page to use the scroll registry: wrapped sections in `ScrollSections`, render the entrance block plus five colored `BasicSection`s, and log `section ${n}` on every activation (`template/next/app/page.tsx:1`). Updated template deps/paths to consume `@ui/gsap` (`template/next/package.json:12`, `template/next/tsconfig.json:24`).

검증: `pnpm --filter @template/next lint`

Next steps: 1) `pnpm --filter @template/next dev`로 실행해 스크롤하며 콘솔 로그와 페이드 인 애니메이션을 직접 확인해 보세요.

content.text:
- Wired up new landing pieces so you can validate scroll animations end-to-end: added `Enterance` and `BasicSection` components with GSAP-ready `data-anim` hooks and configurable backgrounds/button actions (`packages/ui/shadcn/components/section/Enterance.tsx:1`, `packages/ui/shadcn/components/section/BasicSection.tsx:1`).
- Registered the `showFromZeroAlpha` preset to fade and slide content in as sections enter the viewport (`packages/ui/gsap/src/presets/showFromZeroAlpha.ts:1`, `packages/ui/gsap/src/presets/index.ts:1`).
- Reworked the Next template page to use the scroll registry: wrapped sections in `ScrollSections`, render the entrance block plus five colored `BasicSection`s, and log `section ${n}` on every activation (`template/next/app/page.tsx:1`). Updated template deps/paths to consume `@ui/gsap` (`template/next/package.json:12`, `template/next/tsconfig.json:24`).

검증: `pnpm --filter @template/next lint`

Next steps: 1) `pnpm --filter @template/next dev`로 실행해 스크롤하며 콘솔 로그와 페이드 인 애니메이션을 직접 확인해 보세요.
